ygData.subject: RE: Shin Gauntlets and Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep that s the one.  If you go down that first ramp once in Lower Guk there are live froggies at the bottom in the t-intersection.  If you go right you go dead
ygData.messageBody:
Yep that's the one. If you go down that first ramp once in Lower Guk there
are live froggies at the bottom in the t-intersection. If you go right you
go dead side and waterfall, if you go left more live froggies. The
T-intersection is kinda the crossover point between dead and live froggies,
you can find both greaves and gauntlets within easy fleeing distance of the
zone there.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 1:15 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and Greaves


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

That does not sound like the same one I use. I would say stay to the far
right side of Upper Guk. Go into the water like you are going to the heart
spider rooms. Past them, thru the hot tub room, thru the room with the
square columns. Keep holding to the right hand side - down the halls. Cross
the bridge with the spiders and don't fall in - real pain finding the ladder
to get out. Thru the slime hall and soon there will be a hall to the right
and a torch pot and the zone to the dead side of lower. If there are a
bunch of high levels sitting around healing, you know a train just came
thru. When they go back in, you will prolly find some ded froggies with
greaves and gaunts. If some one shouts train, get moving to the zone.

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 3:56 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and Greaves

From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

The entrance that drops you at the crossroads between live
side and dead
side above the waterfall.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: edwardscanni [mailto:edwardscanni@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 2:53 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and Greaves


From: "edwardscanni" <edwardscanni@...>

Uldar, I have a map of Guk-but which entrance to lower do
you go for the
greaves and gloves?
Scanna Swiftsinger
-----Original Message-----
From: jasroc@... <jasroc@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, November 29, 1999 4:42 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and Greaves


>From: jasroc@...
>
>
>So, My advice to young bards, Get a map, enter Guk, go
invis, trot down to
Lower Guk and wait. I could have looted 2 more gloves and
greaves from
corpses at the exit. Plus, even if you can't complete the
quests just yet,
the gloves(AC 7,+5poison Wt5) and greaves(AC
10,+5disease,Wt7.7) are nice
(plus they look cool).
>
>Uldar Ulfangson
>32nd Bard, Rodcet Nife
>
